text:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/">
  <ShortName>Zim catalog search</ShortName>
  <Description>Search zim files in the catalog.</Description>
  <Url type="application/atom+xml;profile=opds-catalog;kind=acquisition"
       xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom"
       xmlns:k="http://kiwix.org/opensearchextension/1.0"
       indexOffset="0"
       template="/catalog/v2/entries?q={searchTerms?}&lang={language?}&name={k:name?}&tag={k:tag?}&maxsize={k:maxsize?}&count={count?}&start={startIndex?}"/>
</OpenSearchDescription>
